item.title: Introduction into Bug Bounty
item.description: Subjects Prerequisites Choose Your Website Recon/Hacking Writeup Resources Prerequisites Mindset So you want to get into bug bounty? Great, but I highly recommend you come in with this mindset: Be positive, be persistent, and play the waiting game. Operating Systems Now let's pick an operating system: Linux macOS Windows Any of these should do. I would personally not recommend trying to do bug bounty on ChromeOS, as many of your tools would be browser plugins.
